parameters.name: CenId
parameters.description: The ID of the CEN instance.

parameters.name: ChildInstanceAliUid
parameters.description:
The ID of the Alibaba Cloud account to which the network instance belongs.

> If the network instance belongs to another Alibaba Cloud account, this parameter is required.

parameters.name: ChildInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the network instance.

parameters.name: ChildInstanceRegionId
parameters.description:
The ID of the region where the network instance is deployed.

You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~36063~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ChildInstanceType
parameters.description:
The type of the network instance. Valid values:

*   **VPC**: a virtual private cloud (VPC)
*   **VBR**: a virtual border router (VBR)

parameters.name: DestinationCidrBlock
parameters.description:
The destination CIDR block of the route.

Specify the value of this parameter in CIDR notation. Example: 192.168.10.0/24.

parameters.name: RouteTableId
parameters.description: The ID of the route table configured on the network instance.
